description: NIDHI is an umbrella programme conceived and developed by the Innovation & Entrepreneurship division, for nurturing ideas and innovations (knowledge-based and technology-driven) into successful startups.

The NIDHI-Seed Support System ensures availability of seed support to deserving incubatee startups, thereby enabling them to take their venture to the next level and facilitates their success in the market place.

NIDHI is an umbrella programme conceived and developed by the Innovation & Entrepreneurship division, for nurturing ideas and innovations (knowledge-based and technology-driven) into successful startups.
